trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> controls used for editing the properties, layout, appearance, and behavior of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Contiene una raccolta di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controlli utilizzati per modificare le proprietà, layout, l'aspetto e comportamento di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlli.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The EditorPartCollection class is a read-only collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, typically used by an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone to track the set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls contained by the zone.
trans-unit.target: La classe EditorPartCollection è una raccolta di sola lettura <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli, in genere utilizzato da un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>zona per tenere traccia del set di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli contenuti nella zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: When a Web Parts page enters edit mode, and a user selects a control to edit, the editing process begins.
trans-unit.target: Quando una pagina Web part passa alla modalità di modifica e un utente seleziona un controllo da modificare, inizia il processo di modifica.

trans-unit.source: The zone creates a new EditorPartCollection object consisting of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls contained by the zone.
trans-unit.target: La zona crea un nuovo oggetto EditorPartCollection costituito il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli contenuti nella zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: At various phases in the editing process, the zone accesses the EditorPartCollection object to save or retrieve property values between the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls in the collection and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control currently being edited.
trans-unit.target: In varie fasi del processo di modifica, la zona accede all'oggetto EditorPartCollection per salvare o recuperare i valori delle proprietà tra il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli nella raccolta e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo in corso di modifica.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: You can create an EditorPartCollection collection of controls for your own programmatic use if, for example, you need to perform some mass operation on a set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: È possibile creare un insieme di EditorPartCollection di controlli per le proprie esigenze a livello di codice se, ad esempio, è necessario eseguire alcune operazioni di massa su un set di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Even though the EditorPartCollection object is read-only, you can make programmatic changes to the properties of the underlying controls referenced in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Anche se l'oggetto EditorPartCollection è di sola lettura, è possibile apportare modifiche a livello di codice alle proprietà dei controlli sottostanti a cui viene fatto riferimento nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an empty new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza vuota di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The EditorPartCollection constructor initializes an empty instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore EditorPartCollection Inizializza un'istanza vuota della <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection>

trans-unit.source: This overload of the constructor is used internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> class in its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone.CreateEditorParts%2A> method to create an empty collection object.
trans-unit.target: Questo overload del costruttore viene utilizzato internamente dalla <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>classe nella relativa <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone.CreateEditorParts%2A>metodo per creare un oggetto raccolta vuoto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone.CreateEditorParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>

trans-unit.source: The zone then creates instances of all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls declared in the child zone template, and uses an internal method to add them to the collection.
trans-unit.target: La zona quindi crea istanze di tutti i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli dichiarato nel modello di zona figlio e utilizza un metodo interno per aggiungerli alla raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: You cannot use this overload of the EditorPartCollection constructor to create a new instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection> and add <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls to it.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questo overload del costruttore EditorPartCollection per creare una nuova istanza <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection>e aggiungere <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli a tale</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection>

trans-unit.source: You must use one of the other overloads for the EditorPartCollection constructor instead.
trans-unit.target: È invece necessario utilizzare uno degli altri overload del costruttore EditorPartCollection.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection"></xref> class by passing in an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection"> </xref> classe passando un <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>insieme di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controlli.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The EditorPartCollection constructor initializes an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection> class and passes in a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore EditorPartCollection Inizializza un'istanza di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection>classe e passa una raccolta di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection>

trans-unit.source: This is one overload of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor that you can use to create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection> object and add <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls to it.
trans-unit.target: Si tratta di un overload del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection.%23ctor%2A>costruttore che è possibile utilizzare per creare un nuovo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection>oggetto e aggiungere <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli a tale</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Even though the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection> instance created by the constructor is read-only, you can still access the individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls in the collection programmatically and call their properties and methods.
trans-unit.target: Anche se il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection>creato dal costruttore di istanza è di sola lettura, è comunque possibile accedere ai singoli <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>i controlli a livello di codice nella raccolta e chiamare i relativi metodi e proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection>

trans-unit.source: One common scenario for using the EditorPartCollection constructor would be if you want to perform some batch operation on an entire set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, such as changing the content, appearance, or position of a related group of them.
trans-unit.target: Uno scenario comune per l'utilizzo del costruttore EditorPartCollection sarebbe se si desidera eseguire alcune operazioni batch su un intero set di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli, ad esempio la modifica del contenuto, l'aspetto o posizione di un gruppo di elementi correlato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Another common scenario for using the EditorPartCollection constructor is developing custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls that you want to associate with a server control, so that users can edit custom properties on your control.
trans-unit.target: Un altro scenario comune per l'utilizzo del costruttore EditorPartCollection sta sviluppando personalizzato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli che si desidera associare a un controllo server, in modo che gli utenti possono modificare le proprietà personalizzate del controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, your server control must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable> interface, and as part of that task, it must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.CreateEditorParts%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: In questo scenario, il controllo server deve implementare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable>interfaccia, e come parte di tale attività, è necessario implementare la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.CreateEditorParts%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.CreateEditorParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable>

trans-unit.source: In that method, to enable the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls to edit your server control, you must add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> instance, such as an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> object.
trans-unit.target: In quel metodo, per abilitare l'oggetto personalizzato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli di modifica del controllo server, è necessario aggiungere il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>i controlli a un <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>istanza, ad esempio un <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>oggetto.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Then you can pass the collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection> object, which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone uses to set up all the controls and begin the editing process.
trans-unit.target: Non è possibile passare la raccolta di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>i controlli al <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection.%23ctor%2A>costruttore per creare un nuovo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection>dell'oggetto, quale il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>zona utilizzato per impostare tutti i controlli e iniziare il processo di modifica.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controlli.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection"></xref> class by passing in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection"></xref> collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> controls, and an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> collection of additional <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection"> </xref> classe passando un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection"> </xref> insieme di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controlli e un <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>insieme altri <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controlli.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of existing <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>esistente <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controlli in una zona.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> controls not in a zone, but created programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> ma non in una zona, i controlli creati a livello di codice.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a particular control is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se un particolare controllo è contenuto nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The Contains method determines whether a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control is already in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Contains determina se uno specifico <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>è già presente nel controllo di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> being tested for its status as a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> sottoposto a test per lo stato come membro della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Un valore booleano che indica se il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> è presente nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection to an array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Copia la raccolta in una matrice di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controlli.

trans-unit.source: The CopyTo method is useful when you want to create a custom array that can contain the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection> object, a subset of those controls, or a superset of those controls.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo CopyTo è utile quando si desidera creare una matrice di tipo personalizzata che può contenere il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection>oggetto, un subset di tali controlli o un superset di tali controlli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> to contain the copied collection of controls.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> per contenere l'insieme di controlli copiato.

trans-unit.source: The starting point in the array at which to place the collection contents.
trans-unit.target: Il punto iniziale nella matrice in corrispondenza del quale inserire il contenuto della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: References a static, read-only, empty instance of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Fa riferimento a un'istanza statica, vuota e di sola lettura della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: A static, read-only, empty instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection> reduces memory usage in cases where you want an empty collection instance to return the proper object type from a method or to compare the instance with another object, but you do not need to add members to the instance.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza statica, vuota e di sola lettura di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection>riduce l'utilizzo della memoria nei casi in cui si desidera utilizzare un'istanza di raccolta vuota per restituire il tipo di oggetto corretto da un metodo o per il confronto con un altro oggetto, ma non è necessario aggiungere membri all'istanza.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of a particular member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la posizione di un membro specifico della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The IndexOf method is useful if you have multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls on a Web Parts page, and you need to locate a particular control in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Metodo IndexOf è utile se si dispone di più <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli in una pagina Web part ed è necessario individuare un controllo specifico nella raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> that is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> che fa parte della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: An integer that corresponds to the index of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Numero intero che corrisponde all'indice di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controllo nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Returns a specific member of the collection according to a unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un membro specifico della raccolta in base a un identificatore univoco.

trans-unit.source: The index of a particular <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> in a collection.
trans-unit.target: L'indice di un determinato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> in una raccolta.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato nella raccolta.
